/>
VIII.iv.3.B.3.d
.
Self-Employment Development
Development to produce the evidence necessary to establish the degree to which an SC disability has impaired the Veteran’s ability to engage in self-employment
must
generally be more extensive than development in cases in which the Veteran worked for others.
Request that the Veteran furnish a statement regarding the
types of work performed
number of hours worked per week, and
amount of time lost in the previous 12 months due to SC disabilities.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section B - Individual Unemployability (IU) Claims Development
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section B
